term: (("reinforcement learning"[tiab] OR "inverse reinforcement"[tiab] OR "sequential decision"[tiab] OR "adaptive control"[tiab] OR "control policy"[tiab]) OR ("Q-learning"[tiab] OR "fitted Q"[tiab] OR "policy gradient"[tiab] OR "value iteration"[tiab] OR "monte carlo tree search"[tiab] OR MCTS[tiab]) OR ("deep reinforcement"[tiab] OR DQN[tiab] OR "deep Q"[tiab] OR A2C[tiab] OR A3C[tiab] OR PPO[tiab] OR DDPG[tiab] OR SAC[tiab] OR TRPO[tiab]) OR ("markov decision process"[tiab] OR "markov decision"[tiab] OR MDP[tiab]) OR ("offline reinforcement"[tiab] OR "batch reinforcement"[tiab] OR "off-policy"[tiab] OR "on-policy"[tiab])) AND (("mechanical ventilation"[tiab] OR ventilator[tiab] OR "ventilatory support"[tiab])) AND ((wean*[tiab] OR extubat*[tiab] OR "ventilator liberation"[tiab] OR "spontaneous breathing trial"[tiab] OR SBT[tiab]))
